About the Artist

Art

    The most recent painting I've finished is this self-portrait, which I started this year at COSM during a Visionary Art Intensive workshop with Alex and Allyson Grey. I started so many paintings over the summer, it took me the next 6 months to finish them all. I'm working on a brand new painting called Serenity. For now, you can check out more of my fine art or click any of the above tabs to see what other art I've been working on.
